info.title: Authorization server common properties definition
info.description: A spec file containing authorization server common properties definition

clientRegistrationEndpoint.description: Client registration URI that will be shown for developers.

useInTestConsole.description: Authorization Server may be used in the test console

useInApiDocumentation.description: Authorization Server may be used in API documentation

supportState.description: Authorization Server may support client credentials in body by spec. <see cref="http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6749#section-3.1"/>

defaultScope.description: Scope that is going to applied by default on the console page. <see cref="http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6749#section-3.3"/>

grantTypes.description: Form of an authorization grant, which the client uses to request the access token. <see cref="http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6749#section-4"/>

bearerTokenSendingMethods.description: Form of an authorization grant, which the client uses to request the access token. <see cref="http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6749#section-4"/>

TokenBodyParameter.description: OAuth acquire token request body parameter (www-url-form-encoded)
